recipe.name: Chocolate Caramel Crispy
recipe.description: Chocolate Caramel Crispy is a delightful no-bake treat combining crunchy rice cereal with a rich mixture of melted Mars bars and butter, topped with a smooth layer of milk chocolate. It's a simple yet indulgent snack perfect for satisfying sweet cravings.
steps: Grease and line a 20 x 20cm (8" x 8") baking tin with parchment paper.
Chop the Mars bars into small pieces.
In a heatproof bowl, combine the chopped Mars bars and butter.
Place the bowl over a pan of barely simmering water, ensuring the bowl doesn't touch the water.
Stir the mixture with a whisk until smooth and fully melted.
In a large mixing bowl, pour the melted mixture over the Rice Krispies.
Mix until all the ingredients are evenly combined.
Press the mixture evenly into the prepared baking tin and set aside.
Melt the milk chocolate in the microwave or over a pan of barely simmering water.
Spread the melted chocolate over the Rice Krispie mixture.
Leave to set in a cool place.
Once set, slice into squares and serve.
A chef’s work is never done—but for now, enjoy your delicious reward!
